summary: The diff implements both REQ-1 (admin portal routing and guard) and REQ-2 (neon dark theme). However, REQ-1 has a partial mismatch: the spec requires successful login to redirect to /owner-dashboard, but the implementation redirects to /admin/owner-dashboard. REQ-2 is largely satisfied with neon tokens in tailwind.config.js and index.css, but About and Products public pages are not shown in the diff leaving some uncertainty about full coverage.

missing_requirements.requirement: After successful login with admin/admin123, user must be redirected to /owner-dashboard. The spec also lists /owner-dashboard as a protected admin route.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminLogin.tsx navigates to '/admin/owner-dashboard' and App.tsx registers the route as '/admin/owner-dashboard', but the spec explicitly requires the post-login redirect target and protected route to be '/owner-dashboard'.

missing_requirements.requirement: All pages including About and Products public-facing pages must reflect the neon dark theme with no light or blue theme remnants.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include AboutUs.tsx or Products.tsx, so it cannot be confirmed that these pages have been updated to apply the neon theme consistently.

hallucinated_features.description: Remember Me / localStorage session persistence for admin login
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec only requires sessionStorage keys 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive'. The implementation also stores session data in localStorage when Remember Me is checked, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: An /admin index route rendering a separate AdminDashboard hub page
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec lists protected admin routes starting from /owner-dashboard and sub-routes like /admin/stock etc., but does not mention an /admin index route with a separate AdminDashboard hub page.
